death-valley.bestViewing: Best viewing at Badwater Basin and along Highway 190. Visit early morning for cooler temperatures.
death-valley.description: The lowest, hottest, and driest place in North America transforms into a carpet of gold.

anza-borrego.bestViewing: Henderson Canyon Road and Borrego Palm Canyon Trail offer spectacular displays.
anza-borrego.description: California's largest state park becomes a wildflower wonderland after wet winters.

carrizo-plain.bestViewing: Soda Lake Road provides easy access to hillside blooms. Arrive on weekdays to avoid crowds.
carrizo-plain.description: The 'Serengeti of California' hosts one of the state's most impressive superblooms.
